description: This file defines the UI for the Tic-Tac-Toe game screen in a Flutter application, including game status display, score headers, game board grid, and control buttons. It leverages provider for state management and custom themes for styling.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the game interface, including score header, turn indicator, game board, and control buttons.

classes.name: _ScoreHeader
classes.description: Widget displaying the current scores for X and O, and the game mode.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: Reusable widget showing individual player scores.

classes.name: _TurnIndicator
classes.description: Widget indicating the current player's turn or game outcome.

classes.name: _Board
classes.description: Widget rendering the tic-tac-toe grid with cells.

classes.name: _BoardCell
classes.description: Widget representing each cell in the game board, handling tap interactions.

classes.name: _ControlsBar
classes.description: Widget with buttons to restart the round or reset scores.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each widget class, assembling the game interface.

methods.name: _ScoreHeader.build
methods.description: Builds the score display row with scores and game mode.

methods.name: _TurnIndicator.build
methods.description: Constructs the turn indicator with game status.

methods.name: _Board.build
methods.description: Builds the grid view of the game board.

methods.name: _BoardCell.build
methods.description: Builds each cell with tap interaction and styling based on game state.

methods.name: _ControlsBar.build
methods.description: Builds control buttons for resetting game and scores.
